text: Frascarolo is a comune (township) in the Province of Pavia in the Italian region Lombardy, which is about 60 km southwest of Milan and about 40 km southwest of Pavia. As of 31 December 2004, it had 1,277 people and an area of 23.4 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Frascarolo is on the edge of the following townships: Bassignana, Gambarana, Mede, Suardi, Torre Beretti e Castellaro, Valenza. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9)
